text:
- Purdue University
PURCHASING DEPARTMENT
LAFAYETTE. INDIANA
April 11, 1957
University of Illinois
Business Office
Urbana, Illinois
<^c\
*\X%P
%
Gentlemen:
Your statement, dated April 3, 1957, for one subscription to
the NAEB TV RESEARCH FACT. SHEET SERVICE is believed to be an error.
In February we submitted purchase order #3084 for one renewal subscription
and paid for this copy February 18.
We chose to renew only one subscription for this year so if
the statement refers to the second copy directed in the past to Educational
Reference, this copy is to be discontinued.
Very truly yours.
